segments.text: Don't open any of my forwards ! I got a virus !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't tell me you got the dreaded Bush virus . I've heard that that bug is threatening to infect the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's exactly the bug I got . Though , I do kind of like the pictures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Those clothes do suit him better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a second-are these pictures copyrighted ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Probably not . It's off the Internet . What difference does it make ?
segments.speaker: S2
